title: South-Western Blackened Barbecued Chicken
ingredients: ['1 lime, juiced', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '60ml orange juice', '120ml white wine', '60ml honey', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 teaspoon pepper, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon Tabasco or chipotle chilli powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons onion powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons garlic powder', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 pinch dried chilli flakes', 'A pinch cayenne pepper', '45ml olive oil', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breasts']
